content:
I'm happy to help you with that! Congratulations on taking an online art class, by the way - it sounds like you're having a great time with the assignment!

As for your favorite brand of watercolor paper, I'd be happy to help you find an online store that carries it. Can you please tell me the brand name and any specific product details you're looking for (e.g. weight, size, texture, etc.)? That way, I can give you more targeted recommendations.

In general, here are some popular online art supply stores that carry a wide range of watercolor papers:

1. Amazon - They usually have a vast selection of art supplies, including watercolor papers from various brands.
2. Dick Blick Art Materials - A well-known art supply store with a strong online presence, carrying many brands and types of watercolor paper.
3. Jerry's Artarama - Another popular art supply store with a wide selection of watercolor papers from various brands.
4. Cheap Joe's Art Stuff - An online art supply store with a wide range of watercolor papers at competitive prices.
5. Daniel Smith - A specialty store focused on watercolor and mixed media supplies, carrying a variety of high-quality watercolor papers.

Let me know if any of these stores carry your preferred brand, or if you'd like more specific recommendations!
